blogPost.excerpt: Bring your drawings to life and create your own flipbook animations with FlipKit! Whether you are a beginner or a professional, FlipKit provides you all the tools needed to start animating. Be inspired by one our fun examples.
blogPost.body: Bring your drawings to life and create your own flipbook animations with FlipKit! Whether you are a beginner or a professional, FlipKit provides you all the tools needed to start animating. Be inspired by one our fun examples.
blogPost.title: FlipKit - Create your own flipbook animations
blogPost.author: Matthias Buchetics

localize.description: 让你的图画活起来，用FlipKit创建你自己的翻书动画! 无论你是初学者还是专业人士，FlipKit都能为你提供所有需要的工具来开始制作动画。从我们有趣的例子中获得灵感。
讓你的圖畫活起來，用FlipKit創建你自己的翻書動畫! 無論你是初學者還是專業人士，FlipKit都能爲你提供所有需要的工具來開始製作動畫。從我們有趣的例子中獲得靈感。

previous.excerpt: An intuitive method without piano sheet music No more need to know anymore how to decipher piano sheet music or to know music theory. In a few seconds, you recognize the notes to be played on a keyboard. More than 1,000 songs from every genre and skill level
previous.title: La Touche Musicale - You can learn piano online easily with the songs you love

localize.description: 无需钢琴谱的直观方法 不再需要知道如何解读钢琴谱或了解乐理。在几秒钟内，你就能认出要在键盘上演奏的音符。超过1,000首各种风格和技巧水平的歌曲。
localize.tagline: 你可以用你喜欢的歌曲轻松地在网上学习钢琴。

localize.description: 無需鋼琴譜的直觀方法 不再需要知道如何解讀鋼琴譜或瞭解樂理。在幾秒鐘內，你就能認出要在鍵盤上演奏的音符。超過1,000首各種風格和技巧水平的歌曲。
localize.tagline: 你可以用你喜歡的歌曲輕鬆地在網上學習鋼琴。
